general.aboutSubId: All your Substrate addresses and balances in one place
general.loginHint: with {{polkadot}} to see the balances of your account.
general.allAccountsDesc: All Accounts let you see an aggregated view of all the accounts in your Polkadot.js

validatorStaking.title: Validators Staking
validatorStaking.subtitle: Stake your tokens by nominating validators, and receive rewards in return. You can unstake at any time, but it will take {{bondingDuration}} for your tokens to be unlocked.

startNominatingScreen.title: Start Staking
startNominatingScreen.subtitle: Stake to one or more validators in order to receive staking rewards.

stake.title: 1. Stake {{symbol}}
stake.subtitle: Please enter the amount to stake and choose how the rewards will be awarded.

selectValidators.title: 2. Set Validators
selectValidators.subtitle: Stake to our recommended validators, or choose yourself from the list of active validators.

minimumStake.title: Minimum Stake
minimumStake.desc: The minimum amount of tokens required to stake.

minimumActiveStake.title: Minimum Active Stake
minimumActiveStake.desc: The minimum amount of staked tokens required to earn rewards from nominating a specific validator.

bondInput.label: Amount
bondInput.bondAlert: You do not meet the minimum bond of {{amount}} {{symbol}}

recommended.title: Stake with recommended validators
recommended.desc: We’ll select the top validators based on security and profitability criteria

table.apyDesc: Estimated annual percentage gain on your staked tokens.

controller.desc: Use separate accounts to hold and control your staked tokens for increased security. This is optional, as you use the same account for both by default.
controller.stashDesc: This account holds the staked tokens and can set a controller account.
controller.controllerDesc: This account controls your staked tokens, and can stake, unstake, change your nominations, etc.

unlocks.desc: Unlocks take {{bondingDuration}} eras before they can be withdrawn. You can rebond unlocks at any time in this period, or withdraw them to your free balance thereafter.

stakeMoreOrUnstake.noRewards: No staking rewards are earned during the unstaking period
stakeMoreOrUnstake.redeem: After your tokens finish unstaking, remember to redeem them

bond.title: Stake more token
bond.desc: Staking is currently inactive. Current minimal stake is

chooseValidators.title: Choose your validators
chooseValidators.desc: Staking is currently inactive. Choose validators to start nominating.

changeValidators.title: Change your validators
changeValidators.desc: You are nominated one or more oversubscribed validators, and will not receive any rewards this era.

waitingNominator.title: Rewards will begin in the next era.

changeValidatorsScreen.title: Set Validators
changeValidatorsScreen.desc: Stake to our recommended validators, or choose yourself from the list of active validators.

successMessages.rewardDestination: The reward destination has been successfully changed

signIn.walletsDesc: Choose one of the available wallet providers to connect to Sub.ID.
signIn.accountsDesc: Click on your account to Sign In
signIn.installToolTip: Install {{title}} or refresh a page if {{title}} is already installed
signIn.notInstalled: {{title}} extension is not installed or refresh a page if {{title}} is already installed
signIn.setupWalletLink: How do I set up a wallet?

banner.placeholderDesc: Choose a banner NFT from one of our collections

modal.title: Choose a banner NFT for your page
modal.desc: Now you can install a banner from any of our collections. If you would like to buy a new banner,
modal.warning: Your energy is less than 1 NRG token.

staking.desc: Stake your tokens by delegating them to collators, and receive rewards in return. You can withdraw at any time, but the withdrawal process may take a few days, depending on the chains settings.

whatIs.title: What is staking?
whatIs.desc: Due to Sub.ID supporting a wide variety of blockchains, it is impossible to precisely answer this question. However, in general, you lock up your tokens, and receive rewards. You can unlock them at any time, but it usually takes anywhere from a few hours to a few days for the unlocking process to finish, depending on the settings of a particular blockchain.

whichCollator.title: Which collator should I pick?
whichCollator.desc: You can choose any collator, but generally rewards will be higher on collators with a lower total stake. Note that if a collator’s total stake gets too low, it will drop out of the active set and stop receiving rewards.

canIStake.title: Can I stake to more than one collator at a time?
canIStake.desc: Yes, you can stake to as many collators as you wish.

canIModify.title: Can I modify my existing stake and/or delegations?
canIModify.desc: Yes. You can partially or fully unstake and withdraw your delegations at any time, as well as delegate to new collators or increase any of your existing stakes.

warnningSection.title: Incompatible network
warnningSection.desc: To display {{network}} staking, please use a {{network}} account

dashboard.desc: Stake your tokens by delegating them to collators, and receive rewards in return. You can withdraw at any time, but the withdrawal process may take a few days, depending on the chain’s settings.

modal.minUnstake: {{minStake}} {{currency}} minimum stake, please leave {{minStake}}+ {{currency}} or unstake all

favoritesAccounts.title: Favorites Accounts
favoritesAccounts.pageDesc: A private list that is stored locally only in this browser and is available only to you.

notifs.added: Account was added to the favorites

modal.desc: After adding an account to favorites, you can find it using the tab in the sidebar. In the field below, you can add a label for this address for quick search in the future.

loading.transaction: It may take up to 30 seconds

totalPortfolioValue.title: Total portfolio value
totalPortfolioValue.description: Total value of transferable, non-transferable, and crowdloaned tokens across multiple Substrate-based chains

transferableBalance.title: Transferable balance
transferableBalance.description: Total value of transferable tokens across multiple Substrate-based chains

nonTransferableBalance.title: Non-transferable balance
nonTransferableBalance.description: Total value of reserved and locked tokens across multiple Substrate-based chains including frozen Statemine assets

lockedCrowdloans.title: Locked in crowdloans
lockedCrowdloans.description: Total value of KSM and DOT locked in crowdloans

donation.title: Transfer
donation.donationFailed: You cannot donate more than your available balance

placeholders.searchAccountAddress: Search by account address (e.g. Polkadot, Kusama, Acala, etc.)

tooltip.copyAddress: Click to copy the full address
tooltip.maximumContribution: The maximum amount of {{symbol}} that can be contributed to this crowdloan.
tooltip.percentageOfTotalSupply: The percentage of the total supply that the project is allocating to this crowdloan.
tooltip.additionalReward: The additional rewards that you will earn per {{symbol}} contributed by contributing through Sub.ID.
tooltip.frozenAsset: This asset is frozen and cannot be transferred at this time.
tooltip.frozenByAdmin: The administrator of this token has frozen this token for all accounts.
tooltip.claimNotSupported: This parachain does not yet support claims.

transfer.title: Transfer

subtitle.sameChain: Transfer tokens to another account on the same chain.
subtitle.crossChain: Transfer tokens to the same or another account on a different chain.

successSubtitle.sameChain: You have successfully transferred your tokens.
successSubtitle.crossChain: You have successfully transferred your tokens, and they will arrive in about 30 seconds.

transfer.existentialDepositInDestAlert: The <1>existential deposit</1> for {{token}} on {{network}} is {{existential}}. Please transfer more than {{minTransfer}}.
transfer.existentialDepositInSourceAlert: The <1>existential deposit</1> for {{token}} on {{network}} is {{existential}}. Please leave at least {{existential}} or transfer the entire balance to prevent your account from being reaped.

errors.swapRouteNotFound: Transferring in this direction is not supported.

amount.exceedMax: Amount must not exceed your maximum balance
